description: This file defines the data transfer object (DTO) class TodoCreateRequest used for creating new Todo items in the backend. It includes fields for title, description, and due date, with validation constraints and Swagger annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: TodoCreateRequest
classes.description: DTO class for creating a new Todo, includes validation and schema annotations for API documentation.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Retrieves the title of the Todo.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the Todo.

methods.name: getDescription
methods.description: Retrieves the description of the Todo.

methods.name: setDescription
methods.description: Sets the description of the Todo.

methods.name: getDueDate
methods.description: Retrieves the due date of the Todo.

methods.name: setDueDate
methods.description: Sets the due date of the Todo.
